values: Harmeet Dhillon’s War on the Discrimination Against White Christians and DOJ Corruption

For decades, big city mayors have hired public employees based on race. That’s illegal but nobody’s stopped them. Then Harmeet Dhillon took over the civil rights division at DoJ.



(00:00) Intro

(01:20) The Grim Reality Dhillon Was Faced With After Entering the DOJ

(04:24) The DOJ Lawyers Who Actually Cried After Trump’s Election

(12:05) Dhillon’s Mission to End Discrimination Against White Christian Men

(28:32) Is Dhillon Worried About Being Trapped by Deep State Actors?

(40:39) The Crimes of Biden’s DOJ
